name: BATTLE PIXELS
description: Battle Pixels is a frantic arcade action, point and click shoot 'em up with a 16 bit retro style.Take control of your tanks and eliminate the enemy's turret defences over 25 randomly generated levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Memory: 512 Mo MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 22 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Terrible i played for only 5 min and it was lagging to the point where i could not do anything getting a refund right now. Do not buy!!!

BATTLE PIXELS its like upgraded version of well know Tanks game. Gameplay very simple, same as from original Tanks - need destroy enemy units and you win round. Great 16-bit retro style and soundtrack (I like it very much). But keep in mind, its hard game, I am failed a lot of levels! Need more practice for me :) Also, the things what I dislike are no support my resolution and force enabling fullscreen after complete levels. In overall nice indie game and worth $1.59 USD for sure.
